name: A Flappy Mega Shark FREE: Eats Tiny Bird Fish Adventure
name_original: A Flappy Mega Shark FREE: Eats Tiny Bird Fish Adventure
description:
Mega Shark is hungry! Help him eat the tiny bird fish while avoiding the pipes. How far can you get?

(How to Play)
> Tap to flap
> Avoid pipes

(Nextpeer Multiplayer)
> Compete with friends in real time
> Compare high scores with the leaderboard

Download now 100% FREE.
